item.title: Flashback: Biden repeatedly equated Islamophobia and antisemitism amid surge in attacks on Jews
item.description: President Joe Biden repeatedly linked antisemitism with Islamophobia despite record-high antisemitic incidents on U.S. soil, Fox News Digital found.

item.title: Johnson says Hegseth possibly sending Marines to anti-ICE riots not heavy-handed: 'Deterring effect'
